content:
# The attempt to insert 10 iron ore into the furnace has failed again, as my inventory remains unchanged and still shows 10 iron ore. However, the furnace now has 20 iron ore, indicating it has accepted some of the materials.
# 
# This suggests that I have not been able to successfully reference the furnace during my insertion attempts, which has led to repeated failures in transferring iron ore from my inventory to the furnace.
# 
# To resolve this issue, I will first check the furnace's current state and ensure it is operational and ready to accept more iron ore.

# Let's inspect the furnace's inventory and status once more.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)  # Checking the furnace's inventory.
print(f"Furnace Inventory: {furnace_inventory}")  # Displaying the furnace's inventory and its status.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Displaying the current state of entities on the map.
